title: Genzyme's Lemtrada Approved in Canada for Treatment of Multiple Sclerosis
description: December 13, 2013 08:00 AM Eastern Standard Time CAMBRIDGE, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Genzyme, a Sanofi company (EURONEXT: SAN and NYSE: SNY), announced today that Health Canada has approved Lemtrada... | December 13, 2013 08:00 AM Eastern Standard Time CAMBRIDGE, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Genzyme, a Sanofi company (EURONEXT: SAN and NYSE: SNY), announced today that Health Canada has approved Lemtrada...
